price: তেওঁলোকে ৰাতিৰ অতি কম সময় টোপনিত কটাইছিল,
arabic: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: kānū qalīlan mina al-layli mā yahjaʿūna
